text: "The Masses Against the Classes" is a 2000 song by Welsh rock band Manic Street Preachers and was released as a stand alone song. It went to number 1 in Scotland and the United Kingdom, number 4 in Finland, number 7 in Ireland, number 12 in Norway and number 157 in France where it was their only song of theirs to chart in France. ==Track listing== All music was written by James Dean Bradfield and Sean Moore except where indicated. All lyrics were written by Nicky Wire except where indicated. UK CD and 10-inch single # "The Masses Against the Classes" – 3:23 # "Close My Eyes" – 4:27 # "Rock and Roll Music" (music and lyrics: Chuck Berry) – 2:53 ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Manic Street Preachers songs
title: The Masses Against the Classes
